reviewText:
This adorable little romp features priceless scenes of those adorable little piglets getting into all sorts of trouble! With our genes so similar you'd almost thing they were people!

Highlights:
- Pigs in a blanket... literally!
- Running around the farm
- Pigs and pugs
- Wrestling on fireball
- Piglets eating ice cream
- The look on my grandkids' faces!
